overview: Three men survive a plane crashes on an uncharted Pacific island, south of Tahiti. One falls in love with the the daughter of the tribe's leader, heiress to the throne after the death of her brother, who is as savage as her pet leopard. The others try to devise a plan to rob the tribe's gold.
tagline: DARING DAYS! EXOTIC NIGHTS! in a forbidden Pagan Paradise!
title: South of Tahiti
